mapper.insert:
select SEQ_ID_CARD.Nextval from dual
INSERT INTO STOCK_ID_CARD (ID, USER_ID, TRUENAME, ID_CARD, IDENTIFY_DATE) VALUES (#{id}, (SELECT U.ID FROM STOCK_USER U WHERE U.NICKNAME = #{nickname} AND ROWNUM = 1), #{truename}, #{idCard}, SYSDATE)

select SEQ_FUND_ASSIGN_RADIO_ID.Nextval from dual
INSERT INTO STOCK_FUND_ASSIGN_RADIO (ID, USER_ID, NICKNAME, UP_LINE_PERCENT) VALUES (#{id}, (SELECT U.ID FROM STOCK_USER U WHERE U.NICKNAME = #{nickname}), #{nickname}, (SELECT R.DOWN_LINE_PERCENT FROM STOCK_FUND_ASSIGN_RADIO R WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM STOCK_USER U WHERE U.NICKNAME = #{nickname} AND U.REFEREE_ID = R.USER_ID)))

select SEQ_stock_bank_info_id.Nextval from dual
INSERT INTO STOCK_BANK_INFO (ID, USER_ID, BANK, CARD_NUMBER) VALUES (#{id}, (SELECT U.ID FROM STOCK_USER U WHERE U.NICKNAME = #{nickname}), #{bank}, #{number})
mapper.select: Select 1 From Stock_Id_Card s Where s.Deposit_Pwd = #{depositPwd} And Exists (Select 1 From Stock_User u Where u.Nickname = #{nickname} And u.Id = s.User_Id)
SELECT 1 FROM STOCK_TOTAL_FUND S WHERE S.TOTAL_FUND > to_number(#{tradeFund}) AND S.FUND_ACOUNT = #{fundAccount} and is_current='Y'
mapper.update: update stock_user set TELEPHONE = #{telephone} where nickname = #{nickname}
mapper.insert:
select sqt_user_operate_maininfo_id.nextval FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO STOCK_USER_OPERATE_MAININFO (ID, OPERATE_ACCOUNT_ID, NICKNAME, TRADE_FUND, GUARANTEE_CASH, STOP_CASH, WARN_CASH, START_DATE) VALUES (#{id}, #{operateAccountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeFund,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{guaranteeCash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stopCash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warnCash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_date(#{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd'))
mapper.select: SELECT a.Trade_Acount, a.Trade_Password, (Select 'HB000' || m.Id From Stock_User_Operate_Maininfo m Where m.Operate_Account_Id = a.Id And m.Is_Current = '1') ASSET_ID FROM stock_user_operate_acount a where a.nickname=#{nickname} and a.is_current='1'

SELECT OPERATOR_ACOUNT, U.OPERATOR_PWD, U.COMBINE_ID, A.FUND_ACCOUNT, A.COMBINE_ID MANAGER_COMBINE_ID FROM STOCK_USER_ACOUNT_ASSIGNED U, STOCK_MANAGER_ACOUNT A WHERE FLAG = '0' AND U.FUND_ACCOUNT = A.FUND_ACCOUNT AND A.STATUS = '1'

SELECT A.COMBIE_ID, A.FUND_ACCOUNT, A.TRADE_ACOUNT, (SELECT S.COMBINE_ID FROM STOCK_MANAGER_ACOUNT S WHERE S.FUND_ACCOUNT = A.FUND_ACCOUNT) MANAGER_COMBINE_ID FROM STOCK_USER_OPERATE_ACOUNT A WHERE A.NICKNAME = #{nickname} AND A.IS_CURRENT = '1'
mapper.update: update stock_user_acount_assigned a set a.flag ='1',operator_pwd = #{newOperatePwd} where a.OPERATOR_ACOUNT=#{operatorAcount}
mapper.select: SELECT M.OPERATOR_NO, M.OPERATOR_PWD, M.COMBINE_ID, M.FUND_ACCOUNT FROM STOCK_MANAGER_ACOUNT M where rownum = 1
SELECT count(1) FROM STOCK_MANAGER_ACOUNT M where m.STATUS='1'
Select t.Nickname, t.Combie_Id, t.Fund_Account, t.Trade_Acount, t.Trade_Password From Stock_User_Operate_Acount t Where t.Is_Current = '1'
SELECT T.COMBIE_ID FROM STOCK_USER_OPERATE_ACOUNT T where t.nickname=#{nickname} and t.is_current = '1'

SELECT W.NICKNAME, (SELECT U.TELEPHONE FROM STOCK_USER U WHERE U.NICKNAME = W.NICKNAME) TELEPHONE, W.BALANCE FROM STOCK_USER_WALLET W WHERE W.BALANCE <= (SELECT M.ADD_MANAGEMENT_FEE FROM STOCK_USER_OPERATE_MAININFO M WHERE W.NICKNAME = M.NICKNAME and M.Is_Current = '1')

Select s.id,s.Fund, s.Transaction_Type, To_Char(s.Transaction_Time, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:ss') Transaction_Time, s.DECRIPTION From (Select Row_Number() Over(Order By t.Transaction_Time desc) As Num, t.* From Stock_Fund_Flow t Where t.Nickname = #{nickname} And t.Transaction_Type != '70') s Where Num > = #{offset} + 1 And Num < = #{offset} + 20
mapper.update: UPDATE STOCK_USER U SET U.FIGURE_PWD = #{figurePwd} WHERE U.NICKNAME = #{nickname}
mapper.select: Select (Select Case When m.Guarantee_Cash Is Null Or m.Guarantee_Cash = '' Then 0.00 Else m.Guarantee_Cash End From Stock_User_Operate_Maininfo m Where m.Nickname = w.Nickname and m.is_current = '1') Guarantee_Cash, (Select Case When m.Actual_Cash Is Null Or m.Actual_Cash = '' Then 0.00 Else m.Actual_Cash End From Stock_User_Operate_Maininfo m Where m.Nickname = w.Nickname and m.is_current = '1') Actual_Cash, w.Balance, w.FREEZE_CASH From Stock_User_Wallet w Where w.Nickname = #{nickname}
mapper.insert:
select SEQ_USER_WITHDRAWL_CASH.Nextval from dual
INSERT INTO STOCK_USER_WITHDRAWL_CASH (ID, NICKNAME, WITHDRAWL_CASH, TIME) VALUES (#{id}, #{nickname}, #{fund}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update Stock_User_Wallet set FREEZE_CASH = FREEZE_CASH + to_number(#{fund}),BALANCE = BALANCE- to_number(#{fund}) where nickname = #{nickname}
mapper.select: SELECT 1 FROM STOCK_ID_CARD C WHERE C.ID_CARD Is Not Null AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM STOCK_BANK_INFO B WHERE B.CARD_NUMBER Is Not Null AND B.USER_ID = C.USER_ID) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM STOCK_USER U WHERE U.ID = c.user_id AND U.NICKNAME = #{nickname})

Select s.id,s.Nickname, Card.Truename, Card.Id_Card, (Select Bank.Bank From Stock_Bank_Info Bank Where Bank.User_Id = Card.User_Id) Bank, (Select Bank.Card_Number From Stock_Bank_Info Bank Where Bank.User_Id = Card.User_Id) Card_Number, s.Withdrawl_Cash, s.Status, to_char(s.Time,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') time From Stock_User_Withdrawl_Cash s, Stock_Id_Card Card Where Exists (Select 1 From Stock_User u Where u.Id = Card.User_Id And s.Nickname = u.Nickname)
and nickname like '%'||#{nickname}||'%'
and status = #{depositType}
Order by s.Time desc
mapper.update: update STOCK_USER_WITHDRAWL_CASH set STATUS ='1' where id = #{id}
update Stock_User_Wallet set freeze_cash = freeze_cash - to_number(#{cash}) where nickname = #{nickname}
UPDATE STOCK_TOTAL_FUND S SET S.Is_Current = 'N' WHERE S.Is_Current='Y' and S.FUND_ACOUNT = #{fundAccount}
UPDATE STOCK_TOTAL_FUND S SET S.Is_Current = 'Y' WHERE S.Is_Current='M' and S.FUND_ACOUNT = #{fundAccount}
mapper.insert:
select Seq_Stock_Total_Fund_Id.Nextval from dual
Insert Into Stock_Total_Fund (Id, Total , Total_Fund, Modify_Cash, FUND_ACOUNT,DESCRIPTION,Happend_Time) Values (#{id}, (SELECT TOTAL + (CASE WHEN #{type}=1 then To_Number(#{fund}) else 0 end) FROM STOCK_TOTAL_FUND WHERE IS_CURRENT = 'Y' AND FUND_ACOUNT = #{fundAccount}), (SELECT TOTAL_FUND + To_Number(#{fund}) FROM STOCK_TOTAL_FUND WHERE IS_CURRENT = 'Y' AND FUND_ACOUNT = #{fundAccount}), (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(#{fund}) < 0 THEN #{fund} ELSE '+' || #{fund} END), #{fundAccount}, #{desc}, Sysdate )
mapper.select: select fund_account from STOCK_USER_OPERATE_ACOUNT t where t.is_current='1' and nickname = #{nickname}
Select count(1) From STOCK_TOTAL_FUND where FUND_ACOUNT = #{fundAccount}

Select TOTAL,TOTAL_FUND,MODIFY_CASH,to_char(HAPPEND_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') HAPPEND_TIME,is_current,description, (select ASSET_UNIT_NAME from STOCK_MANAGER_ACOUNT where fund_account = #{fundAccount}) fundAccountName, Trim(To_Char((Total_Fund / Total * 100), '99999999999999.99')) || '%' Percents From STOCK_TOTAL_FUND where FUND_ACOUNT = #{fundAccount} order by HAPPEND_TIME desc
SELECT 1 FROM STOCK_USER_OPERATE_MAININFO M WHERE M.IS_CURRENT = '1' AND M.market_cash = 0 AND M.NICKNAME = #{nickname}

SELECT (M.GUARANTEE_CASH + M.PROFIT_LOSS_CASH) USERCASH,
M.Actual_Cash ASSIGNCASH, (SELECT A.FUND_ACCOUNT FROM STOCK_USER_OPERATE_ACOUNT A WHERE A.ID = M.OPERATE_ACCOUNT_ID) FUND_ACCOUNT FROM STOCK_USER_OPERATE_MAININFO M WHERE M.IS_CURRENT = '1' AND M.NICKNAME = #{nickname}
mapper.insert:
select SEQ_STOCK_USER_INTEGRAL_ID.Nextval from dual
INSERT INTO STOCK_USER_INTEGRAL I (ID, USER_ID, REFEREE_ID) VALUES (#{id}, (SELECT U.ID FROM STOCK_USER U WHERE U.NICKNAME = #{nickname}), (SELECT REFEREE_ID FROM STOCK_USER U WHERE U.NICKNAME = #{nickname}))
mapper.select: Select s.Nickname From Stock_User s Where Exists (Select 1 From Stock_User u Where u.Nickname = #{nickname} And s.Id = u.Referee_Id)
select 1 from Stock_User_Wallet w where w.nickname = #{nickname}
mapper.update: Update STOCK_USER_WALLET w Set w.balance = balance + to_number(#{redPacket}) where w.nickname = #{nickname}
mapper.select: SELECT R.ASSIGN_REFEREE_RED_PACKET, R.ASSIGN_REGISTER_RED_PACKET, R.ASSIGN_REFEREE_DRAW_PERCENT, (SELECT U.ID FROM STOCK_USER U WHERE R.NICKNAME = U.NICKNAME) ID FROM STOCK_FUND_ASSIGN_RADIO R WHERE R.Nickname =#{nickname}
mapper.update: MERGE INTO STOCK_REFEREE_RED_PACKET P USING (SELECT #{id} ID, #{refereeId} REFEREE_ID, (SELECT U.NICKNAME FROM STOCK_USER U WHERE U.ID = #{refereeId}) REFEREE_NICKNAME, #{redPacket} RED_PACKET FROM DUAL) T ON (P.REFEREE_ID = T.REFEREE_ID AND P.REFEREE_NICKNAME = T.REFEREE_NICKNAME) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET P.RED_PACKET = RED_PACKET WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (P.ID, P.REFEREE_ID, P.REFEREE_NICKNAME, P.RED_PACKET) VALUES (T.ID, T.REFEREE_ID, T.REFEREE_NICKNAME, T.RED_PACKET)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM STOCK_USER U, STOCK_USER_INTEGRAL I, STOCK_USER_OPERATE_MAININFO M WHERE M.NICKNAME = U.NICKNAME AND U.ID = I.USER_ID AND M.END_DATE Is Not Null AND M.IS_CURRENT = '0'

SELECT (SELECT A.COMBIE_ID FROM STOCK_USER_OPERATE_ACOUNT A WHERE A.ID = M.OPERATE_ACCOUNT_ID AND A.IS_CURRENT = '0 ') COMBIE_ID, U.NICKNAME, (SELECT K.NICKNAME FROM STOCK_USER K WHERE K.ID = I.REFEREE_ID) REFEREE, M.SHARE_BONUS, (SELECT W.BALANCE FROM STOCK_USER_WALLET W WHERE W.NICKNAME = U.NICKNAME) BALANCE, M.ASSIGN_REFEREE_CASH FROM STOCK_USER U LEFT JOIN STOCK_USER_INTEGRAL I ON (I.USER_ID = U.ID), STOCK_USER_OPERATE_MAININFO M WHERE M.NICKNAME = U.NICKNAME AND M.END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND M.IS_CURRENT = '0' AND U.REFEREE_ID IS NOT NULL
AND u.nickname like '%'||#{referee}||'%'
Order by m.END_DATE desc

Select (Select b.Bank From Stock_Bank_Info b Where b.User_Id = u.Id) Bank, (Select b.Card_Number From Stock_Bank_Info b Where b.User_Id = u.Id) Card_Number, (Select Use_Rule From Stock_Rule) Use_Rule, (Select Securet_Rule From Stock_Rule) Securet_Rule From Stock_User u Where u.Nickname = #{nickname}
select 1 from stock_user u where u.nickname = #{nickname} and u.telephone=#{telephone}
select 1 from Stock_User_Wallet w where w.nickname = #{nickname} and w.balance>#{guaranteeCash}
mapper.update: Update Stock_Id_Card c Set Deposit_Pwd = #{depositPwd} Where Exists (Select 1 From Stock_User u Where u.Id = c.User_Id And u.Nickname = #{nickname})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM DEPOSIT_RECORD U
SELECT U.ID,U.NICKNAME,u.PAY_ACCOUNT,u.FUND,u.STATUS,to_char(u.PAY_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mm:ss') PAY_DATE FROM DEPOSIT_RECORD U Order by U.pay_date desc
mapper.update: update DEPOSIT_RECORD set STATUS = '1' where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT 1 FROM STOCK_USER_ACOUNT_ASSIGNED U WHERE FLAG = '0' AND ROWNUM = 1 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM STOCK_MANAGER_ACOUNT A WHERE U.FUND_ACCOUNT = A.FUND_ACCOUNT AND A.STATUS = '1')
mapper.update: update STOCK_USER_WALLET w set w.debt = 0,w.balance = #{cash} where w.nickname = #{nickname}
mapper.select: SELECT (W.BALANCE + W.DEBT) residue, W.BALANCE FROM STOCK_USER_WALLET W WHERE W.NICKNAME = #{nickname}

Select w.Balance, (Select Guarantee_Cash From (Select m.Guarantee_Cash From Stock_User_Operate_Maininfo m Where m.Is_Current = '0' And m.Nickname = #{nickname} Order By m.End_Date Desc) s Where Rownum = 1) guarantee_cash From Stock_User_Wallet w Where w.Nickname = #{nickname}
mapper.update: update STOCK_USER_OPERATE_MAININFO set UNACTIVE_END = '1' where id = #{id}
update Stock_User_Wallet set debt = debt + to_number(#{debt}) where nickname = #{nickname}
mapper.select: Select t.Sensitive_Worid From Stock_Sensitive_Word t Where t.Valid_Falg = '1' Order By Id
SELECT S.NICKNAME FROM STOCK_USER S WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM STOCK_USER U WHERE U.NICKNAME = #{nickname} AND U.REFEREE_ID = S.ID)

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM STOCK_FUND_ASSIGN_RADIO T WHERE 1=1
AND T.NICKNAME = #{nickname}
SELECT T.* FROM STOCK_FUND_ASSIGN_RADIO T where T.id = #{id}
mapper.update:
update STOCK_FUND_ASSIGN_RADIO
USER_RANGE = #{range,jdbcType=FLOAT},
STOP_RADIO = #{stopLine,jdbcType=FLOAT},
WARN_RADIO = #{warnLine,jdbcType=FLOAT},
ASSIGN_RADIO = #{assignPercent,jdbcType=FLOAT},
ASSIGN_REFEREE_RED_PACKET = #{toRefereePacket,jdbcType=FLOAT},
ASSIGN_REGISTER_RED_PACKET = #{registerPacket,jdbcType=FLOAT},
ASSIGN_CASH = #{assignCash,jdbcType=FLOAT},
FEE_RADIO = #{managementFeePercent,jdbcType=FLOAT},
UP_LINE_PERCENT = #{upLinePercent,jdbcType=FLOAT},
DOWN_LINE_PERCENT = #{downLinePercent,jdbcType=FLOAT}
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select t.FUND_ACCOUNT ,t.ASSET_UNIT_NAME FUND_ACCOUNT_NAME from STOCK_MANAGER_ACOUNT t where t.status = #{status}
mapper.update: UPDATE STOCK_MANAGER_ACOUNT set status = '0' where fund_account in (${account}) and status!='0'
UPDATE STOCK_MANAGER_ACOUNT set status = '1' where fund_account not in (${account}) and status!='1'
UPDATE STOCK_MANAGER_ACOUNT set status = '1' where status!='1'
update STOCK_USER set status ='0' where nickname = #{nickname}
mapper.select: select telephone from stock_user u where u.nickname = #{nickname}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM STOCK_USER_WALLET T WHERE T.BALANCE <0
AND T.NICKNAME = #{nickname}
Select c.Truename From Stock_Id_Card c Where Exists (Select 1 From Stock_User u Where Id = c.User_Id And u.Nickname = #{nickname})

Select count(1) From Stock_Total_Fund s Where s.Is_Current = 'Y'
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM STOCK_MANAGER_ACOUNT K WHERE K.FUND_ACCOUNT = S.FUND_ACOUNT AND K.ASSET_UNIT_NAME = #{assetName})

SELECT S.TOTAL_FUND, (SELECT ASSET_UNIT_NAME FROM STOCK_MANAGER_ACOUNT A WHERE S.FUND_ACOUNT = A.FUND_ACCOUNT) ASSET_UNIT_NAME, (SELECT ID FROM STOCK_MANAGER_ACOUNT A WHERE S.FUND_ACOUNT = A.FUND_ACCOUNT) MANAGER_ACCOUNT_ID, (SELECT A.STATUS FROM STOCK_MANAGER_ACOUNT A WHERE S.FUND_ACOUNT = A.FUND_ACCOUNT) STATUS, S.TOTAL, TRIM(TO_CHAR((S.TOTAL_FUND / S.TOTAL * 100), 'fm9999999990.99')) || '%' PERCENTS FROM STOCK_TOTAL_FUND S WHERE S.IS_CURRENT = 'Y'
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM STOCK_MANAGER_ACOUNT K WHERE K.FUND_ACCOUNT = S.FUND_ACOUNT AND K.ASSET_UNIT_NAME = #{assetName})
mapper.update: update STOCK_MANAGER_ACOUNT set status=#{type} where id = #{managerAccountId}
